title: Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help
tags: ask the goblin priestess for help
content:
gue options.

That'll put me to sleep - are you trying to trick me? [HALF-ELF] Drink the potion. I'm not drinking that.

Guts will inform you that she is only trying to help when choosing dialogue 1. You now have the option to drink the potion if you are a Half-Elf, to kill her or to not drink it.

Choosing to Drink the Potion

Choosing to drink it will cause you to collapse and pass out. You will wake up later in chains in the Defiled Temple, allowing Guts to rummage through your memories will
